summary: The upgrade represents a “low stakes warm-up” to prepare Beacon Chain developers and client teams for the coming Merge.
title: Altair Upgrade Set to Activate on Ethereum Mainnet This Month
content: On Oct. 27, at epoch 74240, the Altair Beacon Chain upgrade is scheduled to activate on the Ethereum mainnet.
Read more: What Eth 2.0 Validators Can Expect After the ‘Altair’ Upgrade
